testcase.name: AppComponent should render title in a text-mid class
AppComponent should call weatherService.getCityDetails when getCityDetails() is called
CityComponent should display city and country
CityComponent should display temperature with only 1 decimal
CityComponent should display temperature with minimum 2 digits left to decimal
SearchComponent search() should call weatherService.searchLocation when some character is typed
SearchComponent search() should not call weatherService.searchLocation when searchedString is empty
SearchComponent selectedLocation() should be called when cityName is clicked
WeatherService should fetch cities based on searched query
WeatherService should fetch the city details based on the cityId
